titles.title: Take My Life, and Let It Be

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Take my life, and let it be Consecrated, Lord, to Thee; Take my hand, and let them move At the impulse of Thy love, At the impulse of Thy love.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Take my feet, and let them be Swift and beautiful for Thee; Take my voice and let me sing Always, only, for my King, Always, only, for my King.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Take my lips, and let them be Filled with messages for Thee; Take my silver and my gold, Not a mite would I withhold, Not a mite would I withhold.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Take my love, my God, I pour At Thy feet its treasure store; Take myself and I will be Ever, only, all for Thee, Ever, only, all for Thee.
